<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swaggering Initiative](/Feats.aspx?ID=1531) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 90 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You are about to roll initiative.

</column>

---

You swagger readily into any fight—even an ambush. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll and can Interact to draw a weapon.
name: Swaggering Initiative
